summary: A Mexican-American master chef and father to three daughters has lost his taste for food, but not for life.
cast: Jacqueline Obradors|Tamara Mello|Judy Herrera|Nikolai Kinski|Elizabeth Peña|Constance Marie|Troy Ruptash|Ken Marino|Hector Elizondo|Marisabel García|Julio Oscar Mechoso|Louis Crugnali|Raquel Welch|Joel Joan|Paul Rodriguez|Ulysses Cuadra|Mark de la Cruz|Eli Russell Linnetz|Stoney Westmoreland|Eva La Dare|Jamisin Matthews|Paul Rosenbluh|Santiago Verdu
title: Tortilla Soup
